scripts.clean: pkill -f hardhat || true && pkill -f dotnet || true && pkill -f node || true && rm -rf chain/cache chain/artifacts web/bin web/obj node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.chain:deploy:local: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:8545 && cd chain && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.web: wait-on file:web/wwwroot/contractConfig.json && cd web && dotnet run
scripts.bot: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:8545 file:web/wwwroot/contractConfig.json && cd bot && node bot.js
scripts.start:local: npm run clean && npm install && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run chain:node" "npm run chain:deploy:local" "npm run web" "npm run bot"
